page.title: 18Children's Pets - Sealand
page.content: Most children in our class have pets just a few don't.The most common pets are dogs and cats.Dogs need lots of exercise especialy big dogs, who need to be taken for walks nearly every day,but cats can be left out all day and they'll come when they want. Reptiles,amphibions and mammals are all animals some can be pets,some are unusual and some are common.Budgies, goldfish,rabbits,dogs,cats and tortoises are common, snakes, lizards and tarantulas are unusual.You couldn't keep a dog or a cat in a flat because they have no room for exercise, but you could keep small pets like budgies, mice, gerbils, snakes, lizards, or goldfish. Dogs, I think, are the easiest pets to keep, all they need is exercise, food, drink and care, but if you don't care for them they will die like other animals.
